StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Thulium Moon

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Long ago, the Precursors captured a small Thulium node and placed it in orbit of this world. We will be able to use this ready source of Thulium to strengthen the hit points of ships made from our shipyard. Our scientists would also like to study it to see what else we can learn. Technology that can be used to create an artificial moon is not something to be squandered.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This research is definitely important. I encourage them to study the Precursor technologies.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +50% Research

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Have them search for a way to use these technologies to strengthen our ships, regardless of where they are built.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +10% Hit Points to all ships.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This moon is obviously the perfect weapons platform that we can use to secure this world. They can poke around the technologies later.

StringTable.Label: ThuliumMoonEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +75% Planetary Defense

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Durantium Cloud

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: An ancient Precursor race seems to have once inhabited this place. They left behind a cloud of Durantium Asteroids that are now orbiting the world. We will be able to use these to increase the efficiency of the Mass Drivers on our ships. However, we may also be able to use this ready source of Durantium for other purposes.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can use this Durantium to increase the production of this planet and ease the burden on our people.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +5 Production to this colony.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should use the excess Durantium to find ways to increase the armor efficiency on all of our ships.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +15% armor rating to all ship.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We are already using the Durantium to make better Mass Drivers, let's make sure that we stay focused on what's important: killing things.

StringTable.Label: DurantiumCloudEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +5% additional Mass driver attack to all ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Accelerator

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: An immense Precursor Accelerator is orbiting this world. We have been able to tap this device to create even more powerful Drive systems. All of our ships built here will benefit from a great increase in speed. Some of our scientists think they can use the accelerator to refine Elerium as well and would like to do some experimentation.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Excellent, we can use the Elerium to create a defense field for the colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +75% Planetary Defense

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Perhaps we can use this Elerium to increase the strength of our shield systems.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +15% to the Shield strength of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Elerium is great for making beam weapons, right? No question about it, we should put our energy toward making bigger explosions.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorAcceleratorEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +10% to the Beam attack of all our ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Elevator

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors who lived on this world before us left behind a completely functional Space Elevator. This will greatly increase our ability to put manufactured goods into space and will prove very useful to our shipyard. Unfortunately, the public sector and several other groups are putting a great deal of pressure on us. They hope to use the elevator to faciliate their own projects.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: They can use it as a vacation spot when it's available, as long as they don't block military traffic.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +5 Morale, +50% to colonies Tourism income.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can allow some commercial interest time on the Elevator. Any increase in income will be helpful.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +50% to both Colony income, and trade route income.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: The Elevator is too valuable to waste on non-military pursuits. If they have spare time, they can lend it to the war effort.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorElevatorEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +10% military production to all shipyards.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Promethion Refinery

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Two giant Precursor structures orbit the poles of this world. They seem to have been used to somehow terraform a Promethion Gas giant into a habitable world. We are able to use the Promethion stored in them to increase the range of any ships built by our shipyard. Our scientists think they can do more with these giant machines and would like your permission to study them further.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: See if they can find a way to terraform the surface. More usable land is always welcome.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, Terraforms two additional tiles instantly.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: See if there is any way to boost the value of the land we have now.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +1 Level to all improvements on this world.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: See what you can do to shut the complainers up so that they will get to work. We have a galaxy to conquer.

StringTable.Label: PromethionRefineryEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +8 to colonies Morale

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Satellites

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: The former Precursor inhabitants of this would left a large array of very powerful satellites in orbit. We have been able to make use of them to extend both the sensor range of the planet and of the ships that are built here. Our researchers would like to capture one of these satellites for study and have assured us that it will not have any damaging effects on the array.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Excellent. Have our researchers focus on using the satellites to increase our sensor range even further.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +2 Sensor range to all ships, and colonies.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Have our researchers find what the secrets to their power source are so that we can use it in our own systems.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +5 Planetary Production.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: This is a golden opportunity. Make sure our researchers focus what they find into making our weapons systems more accurate.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorSatellitesEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +10% Accuracy to all weapons types on all our ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Treasury

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: This planet is surrounded by an immense Precursor ring. It's full of valuable assets that could be used to generate income. Further studies on the ring have shown that it was once an ancient weapon. Our researchers would like to do some experimentation to see if they can learn how it worked.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: There is so much to be learned from this artifact, but let's focus on things other than destruction.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +50% Research to this colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: New weapons technologies are always welcome, but we don't want to risk destroying our "golden goose."

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +5 to all weapons on all our ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Find out these secrets by any means necessary, regardless of the cost.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorTreasuryEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +10 to all weapons on all our ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Factory

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Through intense research, we have been able to use the ancient Precursor Factory orbiting this world to increase our manufacturing output. Several members of the research team responsible for this have come forward with suggestions on how we can utilize this amazing new asset.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can use the excess manufacturing to improve the quality of life for the citizens of this world.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +10 Morale to this colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We can have the factory focus on building up our infrastructure, which will lower the cost of building all of our improvements.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +50% to all social manufacturing on this colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Using the findings from this research, we can channel our manufacturing efforts to our local shipyard more efficiently.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorFactoryWorldEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +25% Military manufacturing to sponsored shipyard.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Research World

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient array of Precursor Research Bases in orbit of this planet are increasing the research capacity for this world. Our researchers would like permission to see if they can find a way to specialize the focus of these new assets.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Of course. Let's have them research ways to increase the productivity of our worlds.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +4 to Production, and Morale.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Tell them to study everything! We will benefit more from having a wider variety of technologies in the long run.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +25% to all Research on this colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Tell our researchers to focus on ways to make our weapons more deadly and efficient.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorResearchWorldEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +10% to the range of all weapons.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Prison

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Now that we have cleaned the atmosphere, we can use the infrastructure of Precursor Prisons to increase the manufacturing quality of this world. However, there seem to be many more discoveries that are... darker in nature. Should we take advantage of these assets?

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should avoid stirring up the dark past of this world. Let's focus on building up our colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +33% to Social Manufacturing.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It would be best to use the prison infrastructure to fortify this new world.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +50% to Planetary Defense and Planetary Resistance.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: It doesn't matter what the nature of the discovery is! Use the more disturbing devices to make our soldiers relentless.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorPrisonEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +25% to Soldiering Civilization wide.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Experimental World

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: The giant Precursor Experimental Station orbiting this world has become an amazing resource that is assisting the ability of this planet to research new technologies. We have also found some interesting experiments that we may be able to complete with some extra work.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Invite our neighbors to study this amazing artifact. It may help us earn some goodwill.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +10 Influence per turn to this colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should continue working on as many of these experiments as possible.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +10 to Research points per turn.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: If we can find any way to make this world more productive, we should make it our highest priority.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorExperimentalWorldEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +8 Production points to this colony.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Name
StringTable.String: Study the Precursor Quarantine

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Dec
StringTable.String: Cleaning up the atmosphere of this world has shown it to be amazingly productive and resource rich. Our researchers have been studying the Precursor Containment Device that's orbiting the planet and think they can use it to further enhance this world's potential.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Title
StringTable.String: Colonizing Event

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We need to focus on making this planet as comfortable for our colonists as possible.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Benevolent_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Benevolent, +50% to Population growth on this planet.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: We should use these technologies to increase the food capacity of the world.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Neutral_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Pragmatic, +6 to the population cap on this planet.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Name
StringTable.String: Let's see if we can increase the amount of usable land. We can always just make more people later.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorQuarantineEvent_Merciless_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Malevolent, +2 to this planet's class.
